name: Isometric Camping 3w Project
description:
Purpose: This game is supposed to be a very relaxed and laid back game, you can interact with the environment and explore the region that you are camping in.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement

Space - Jump

E - Interact

Why did I make this game?

This is a game I created as part of my studies. This is a isometric game focused on the visual and narrative aspect, which were the parameters given to me for the project. 

Game Engine:

I used Unity to create this game.
